sections.text:
71-2417.Controlled substance; exemption.

Any emergency box containing a controlled substance listed in section 28-405 and maintained at a long-term care facility shall be exempt from subsection (3) of section 28-414.03.

SourceLaws 1994, LB 1210, § 189;Laws 1995, LB 406, § 38;Laws 1999, LB 594, § 59;Laws 2001, LB 398, § 72;Laws 2009, LB195, § 74;Laws 2014, LB811, § 27.
